backend/main.mo: Main actor defining Product types with productName and asin fields, ProductAddRequest, search filters, user profiles, and CRUD operations with access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms OldProduct (with title field) to NewProduct (with productName and asin fields), mapping title to productName and adding empty asin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features for displaying ASIN prominently, showing product name as primary heading, and updating frontend type definitions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, including ProductCard which displays productName as primary heading and ASIN with monospace styling, plus Dashboard, filters, and analysis pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, title for Amazon India Seller Opportunity Finder, and script tag loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for dashboard and competitor analysis, wrapped in ThemeProvider and ErrorBoundary with Toaster for notifications.
Advanced filtering panel managing local filter state with numeric inputs stored as strings, sanitization on apply, comprehensive logging, and reset functionality that triggers data refetch.
frontend/src/components/AlertHistory.tsx: Scrollable alert history component displaying alerts with icons, titles, messages, timestamps, and read/unread badges for opportunity, competition, keyword, and seasonal alerts.
frontend/src/components/AlertNotificatio: A notification bell component that displays alerts in a side sheet, showing mock opportunity and competition alerts with unread count badge.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: A sidebar filter component that displays category buttons with icons, allowing users to filter products by category or view all categories.
Displays a static heatmap image showing opportunity distribution across product categories with a gradient overlay and description.
frontend/src/components/CompetitorCard.t: Renders a card displaying competitor information including rank, price, rating, reviews, listing quality score, and detected weaknesses.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches and displays application errors with reload functionality and detailed stack traces in development mode.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Application footer displaying copyright information and a branded link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with branding, authentication controls, theme toggle, and subscription tier badge for authenticated users.
Keyword research tool with search input that displays mock data including search volume, difficulty score, CPC estimates, trends, and long-tail keyword suggestions.
frontend/src/components/KeywordTrendChar: Line chart component using Recharts to visualize 12-month keyword search trend data.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps pages with header, footer, alert notifications, and conditionally shows profile setup modal for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/LoadingStates.ts: Displays a grid of skeleton loading cards to show while product data is being fetched.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityLeade: Displays a scrollable ranked list of top 10 products sorted by margin, showing product name, category, price, and margin percentage.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityScore: Displays a visual progress meter for opportunity scores (0-100) with color-coded indicators (green for ≥70, yellow for ≥40, red for <40).
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Renders a card displaying product details including price, sales estimates, revenue, margin, rating, BSR, and seller type with color-coded opportunity badges based on margin percentage.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Main grid component that fetches and displays products using filters from useProductFilters hook, handles loading/error states, and includes extensive logging for debugging filter and query state changes.
frontend/src/components/ProductSortContr: Provides a dropdown select control for sorting products by score, revenue, competition, or growth.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to set up their profile with name and email, creating a free-tier subscription on submission.
frontend/src/components/ProfitCalculator: Two-panel calculator component with input form for selling price, cost, weight, and ads budget, displaying a detailed profit breakdown including Amazon fees and margins.
frontend/src/components/RecommendationBa: Displays a color-coded badge (green/red/yellow) with icon indicating product recommendation status (YES/AVOID/MODERATE).
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionTier: Renders a badge showing subscription tier (Free/Pro/Premium) with corresponding icon and color scheme.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes, displaying sun/moon icons with animated transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductFilters.ts: Custom hook managing product filter state (category, price, BSR, revenue, ratings, etc.) with sessionStorage persistence and conversion utilities for backend API calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for product search, fetching individual products, and managing user profiles with fallback mock data and actor-based backend communication.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for theming (light/dark mode) including colors for primary, secondary, destructive, and chart elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitorAnalysis.ts: Page component displaying competitor analysis for a specific product, showing top 10 sellers with pricing, ratings, and competitive metrics using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page orchestrating category filters, advanced filters, and product grid display with filter state management and change handlers.
frontend/src/types/categories.ts: Defines product categories array with associated Lucide icons for Electronics, Home & Kitchen, Fashion, Sports, and other Amazon marketplace categories.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency (INR), numbers (with K/L/Cr suffixes), and dates using Intl API for Indian locale.
frontend/src/utils/profitCalculations.ts: Calculates Amazon seller profit metrics including referral fees, FBA fees, GST, shipping costs, net profit, ROI percentage, and break-even ACOS.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for an Amazon India Seller Opportunity Finder application, tracking architectural decisions, existing features, known issues (non-working filters and inaccurate product data), and requirements across 29 versions.
